div.div: The College of NJ vs. Montclair State

tr.td: Coin flip won by TCNJ, they defer. MSU will recieve.
Will Kitson kickoff 58 yards to the MSU7, Kyiese Lopez return 20 yards to the MSU27 (Dan Mantell;Bryant Sanchez).
